banner.title: Security and Trust that Fly High with You
banner.label: At Pássaro Azul Segurança Privada, we offer safe and personalized solutions to protect what is most important to you, with excellence and professionalism in each service.

our-clients.title: Our Clients
our-clients.label: Clients satisfied with our private security services, ensuring protection and peace of mind in all situations. Meet those who trust Pássaro Azul.

about-us.title: Get to know Pássaro Azul: Excellence and Protection
about-us.label: Pássaro Azul Segurança Privada, Lda., is a young but very dynamic Angolan company that is truly committed to growing and solidifying its position in the private security market, managed by experienced professionals.
about-us.span: Blue Bird: Your trust, our greatest mission.

spans.span-1: We put ourselves in our customers’ shoes, anticipating their needs and offering valuable solutions on a daily basis.
spans.span-2: We guarantee the protection of your business with cutting-edge technology and specialized services.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.label: Provide services and products of the highest quality and professionalism to protect people and assets.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.label: Provide services of excellent quality, innovation and value, be recognized as a reference in ethics, professionalism, respect and solutions for customers and employees, promoting high levels of satisfaction.

our-values.title: Our values
our-values.label: Our principle is quality, innovation and respect, recognizing customers and employees as a reference in private security.

trust.title: Trust
trust.label: The basis for building lasting, transparent and secure relationships with our customers, partners and employees.

excellent_service.title: Excellent Quality Service
excellent_service.label: Our commitment is to exceed expectations, ensuring differentiated service and high standard results.

human_value.title: Human Valuation
human_value.label: We put people at the center of our actions, promoting respect, empathy and mutual growth.

operational_competence.title: Operational Competence
operational_competence.label: We guarantee the efficient and qualified execution of processes, always seeking excellence in our operations.

continuous_training.title: Continuous Training
continuous_training.label: We believe in constant learning as a tool for innovation, personal and professional development.

our-services.title: Our services
our-services.label: Private security services to protect what is most important, with excellence and professionalism.

security_services.title: Property Security
security_services.label: Complete property protection, ensuring the safety of assets, facilities and resources against possible threats.

personalized_security.title: Custom Security
personalized_security.label: Tailor-made security solutions, adapted to the specific needs of each client or situation.

event_security.title: Event Security
event_security.label: Planning and executing strategies to ensure the protection and smooth running of events of any size.

electronic_security.title: Electronic Security
electronic_security.label: Cutting-edge technology with modern monitoring, alarms and access control systems for greater efficiency.

security_consulting.title: Security Consulting
security_consulting.label: Expert analysis and strategic recommendations to implement effective security solutions.

security_central.title: 24h Security Center
security_central.label: Continuous monitoring and immediate support, available at any time to respond to emergencies and prevent risks.

patrol_services.title: Rounds
patrol_services.label: Regular patrolling service to ensure surveillance and tranquility in residential, commercial or industrial areas.

card-1.title: Personalized Protection
card-1.label: At Pássaro Azul Segurança Privada, we adapt our services to your specific needs.

card-2.title: Cutting-edge Technology
card-2.label: We use advanced technology for monitoring and electronic security, providing peace of mind with modern and efficient systems.

card-3.title: Specialized Team
card-3.label: Our team is made up of highly trained professionals committed to ensuring your protection.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.label: Pássaro Azul Private Security offers personalized security solutions to protect what is most important, with excellence and professionalism.

contact-us.label: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you shortly.
